name: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
desc: A symbolic description of the stylistic aspects of a font.

items.name: static var italic: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s style is italic.

items.name: static var bold: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s style is boldface.

items.name: static var expanded: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s characters have an expanded width.

items.name: static var condensed: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s characters have a condensed width.

items.name: static var monoSpace: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s characters all have the same width.

items.name: static var vertical: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font uses vertical glyph variants and metrics.

items.name: static var UIOptimized: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font synthesizes appropriate attributes for user interface rendering, such as in control titles, if necessary.

items.name: static var tightLeading: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font uses a leading value that’s less than the default.

items.name: static var looseLeading: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font uses a leading value that’s greater than the default.

items.name: static var classMask: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font family class mask that you use to access font descriptor values.

items.name: static var classOldStyleSerifs: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s characters include serifs, and reflect the Latin printing style of the 15th to 17th centuries.

items.name: static var classTransitionalSerifs: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s characters include serifs, and reflect the Latin printing style of the 18th to 19th centuries.

items.name: static var classModernSerifs: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s characters include serifs, and reflect the Latin printing style of the 20th century.

items.name: static var classClarendonSerifs: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s characters include variations of old style and transitional serifs.

items.name: static var classSlabSerifs: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s characters use square transitions, without brackets, between strokes and serifs.

items.name: static var classFreeformSerifs: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s characters include serifs, and don’t generally fit within other serif design classifications.

items.name: static var classSansSerif: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s characters don’t have serifs.

items.name: static var classOrnamentals: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s characters use highly decorated or stylized character shapes.

items.name: static var classScripts: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s characters simulate handwriting.

items.name: static var classSymbolic: NSFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The font’s characters consist mainly of symbols rather than letters and numbers.
